script.line: Welcome to POMEGRANATE VILLLAGE! A bustling island town getting ready for a big day.
Today is the FESTI-BALL, an annual celebration of community, instituted by the town's famed BALL MUSEUM.
Under the watchful eye of Pomegranate's Mayoress, the people come together for a night of...
Fun! Sandwiches! Pro wrestling! Robots! Skating! Karaoke! And much, much more!
Every year, citizens spend the days before the Fest-Ball getting ready for the big event.
And now we join one such citizen, Prota, who's got big plans for tonight!
Mom! Mom?
Mooooooooom?
What's wrong, Prota? Have you walked Minty yet?
Sorry Mom, I don't have time! I was just looking for my shoes.
I put them by the back door. They were all muddy!
Perfect! Thanks, Mom!
No problem. But you do need to walk Minty before you go.
I wish I could, but I really need to get to the lab. Marbels is expecting me.
Prota. I know you're excited to help Marbels with his new toy, but you still have responsibilities.
Minty still needs to be walked.
Bark bark!
Hm. Could you do it?
No. I need to get back to naming my new suplexes. I'm opening the show tonight.
I know, I know. What about Dad?
No can do, Prota. I've gotta get to the daycare. The kids and I are gonna put on a little play tonight!
A play? Can toddlers memorize scripts?
Look, they walk out in cute little animal costumes and sing about shapes. We're doing our best.
But it does mean I don't have time to walk Minty.
Okay...
Just take her around the block! It won't take ten minutes. When do you need to be at the lab?
Ummm...
Twenty minutes ago.
...Well, it's off to work for me Have a good one! Love you guys!
Bye, sweetheart!
Bye Dad!
Can I go now?
You're walking Minty, Prota. Text Marbels, tell him you're running late. Then walk her.
After that, you're free. And I'll see you tonight.
Okay, okay. Come on, Minty!
Bark bark!
This is going to be a FAST walk, okay? You feel like running?
Bark.
Perfect. In that case...hmmm.
Bark?
I think I've got an idea...
